boot_command_prefix: e<down><down><down><down><down><down><left> ro quiet init=/bin/bash<leftCtrlOn>x<leftCtrlOff><wait15s>mount -n -o remount,rw /<enter><wait>passwd core<enter><wait>core<enter><wait>core<enter><wait>exec /sbin/init<enter><wait15s>core<enter><wait>core<enter><wait>sudo systemctl mask sshd.socket --now<enter>curl -sLo /tmp/i.json
boot_command_suffix: /bootstrap.json<enter>curl -sLo f.bin.bz2 http://10.8.10.2:8001/f.bin.bz2 && sed -i "s|BUILDERPASSWORDHASH|$(mkpasswd -5 {{user `ssh_password`}})|" /tmp/i.json<enter>sudo flatcar-install -d /dev/vda -C {{user `channel_name`}} -V {{user `release_version`}} -i /tmp/i.json -f f.bin.bz2 -v && sudo reboot<enter>
